  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"

```

```{r setup}
  
  library(tidyverse)
  library(envImport)

```

```{r aoi}

  aoi <- sf::st_read(here::here("inst", "shp", "Bakara_smaller.shp"))

  aoi_buffer <- aoi %>%
    sf::st_buffer(50000) %>%
    sf::st_transform(crs = 4283) %>%
    sf::st_make_valid()

```

```{r get}

  get_GBIF(212 # birds
           , aoi = aoi_buffer
           , min_year = 2000
           )
